title: Drawing, "Project for a sepulchral monument. With alternative suggestions.", 1830–50
title_raw: Project for a sepulchral monument. With alternative suggestions.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: -b: vertical rectangle, loose between -a and -c. An alternative suggestion for a female figure on the right of the drawing.
